ygData.subject: thulian claw hype?
ygData.msgSnippet: The head of my guild just sold me a claw.  (Actually, I will pay later since I don t have that much...) Problem is, I see damage of 8-12 using the claw and
ygData.messageBody:
The head of my guild just sold me a claw. (Actually,
I will pay later since I don't have that much...)

Problem is, I see damage of 8-12 using the claw and
14-16 using my barbed leather whip. The Whip cost me
50 pp, the claws will cost me 200. I don't see the
point.

Can somebody clear this up for me?

Thanks,

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
almost to the 15th Song
